summary: I/O errors writing to PFS from within Slurm jobs

updates.details: Issue reported where I/O errors occur when writing to PFS storage volumes from Slurm jobs. Appears to be memory-related: initial advice is to increase memory allocation for job. Investigation underway with vendor, awaiting further advice.
LOTUS1 ORCHID, including interactive GPU node gpuhost001, was planned to be fully migrated to Rocky 9 by Tuesday 29th April, but due to unforeseen circumstances this has been pushed to today.

The RAL network team is investigating an issue causing short ~15 second outages. Additional troubleshooting is planned between 10:00 and 12:00 noon today Monday 28 April: no interruptions are planned but the work carries that risk.
